WARNING: Some launchers do not handle app icon customization properly. In case the icon will disappear, try launching the app via Google Play or some widget, if available. Once launched, just set back the default orange icon #F57C00. You might have to reinstall the app in the worst case.

You seem to have the app installed on an SD card, that makes the app widgets unavailable. You won\'t even see them on the list of available widgets. It is a system limitation, so if you want to use the widgets, you have to move the app back on the internal storage.

Choose to export backup file, then it will be saved in the docmument folder at the InternalStorage/Documents/BackUpINoteIos.json .To sync, you can either send this file to another device, or when reinstall the app choose to import the sync file and choose where you save the backupnoteios.json file to sync.

%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device.

Time remaining till the reminder triggers:\n%s

Please make sure the reminders work properly before relying on them. Check your device battery and notification settings, if there is nothing blocking the reminders, or killing the app in the background.

%Y - year
%M - month
%D - day
%h - hour
%m - minute
%s - second
%i - number increasing from 1

Thank you for loving my ios style apps. The app still has a lot of bad things but I will try to improve it every day.There will be advertisements in the app, which is the only source of revenue to help me maintain these apps, please understand. Download all my apps to experience. Please rate 5 stars, and if possible buy the pro version to support me to continue developing other ios apps such as calendar, call, sms, photo browser ,...
